name: Comic background reference app
description:
Referencing help for comics

maybe....

Someday in the distant future: 1. Finally it's actually comfy to use. 2. The user can finally add their own objects. 3. There are more than two scenes... Reality atm: 1. This is supposed to be an app/software/game to help draw backgrounds for comics.

*cough* the intended use is not to screenshot the backgrounds and then posterize them *cough*

2. At the moment the controls are a bit odd. 3. And there are only two scenes. 4. Check the game help in the menu for controls and whatnot. I was just trying to get this one thing to work and then...
